org.zamia

Class ZamiaLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zamia.ZamiaLogger

  • public class ZamiaLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to set up a Logger for use in zamiaCAD.
    Author:
    Guenter Bartsch
